messageBody:
1/
Yeap plenty of ...
Just go on the sourceforge & query about it...
Also 1.4 has built-in Assertions :
    www.javaworld.com/javaworld/jw-03-2001/jw-0316-jdk.html
    java.sun.com/j2se/1.4/docs/guide/lang/assert.html
    http://www.jguru.com/faq/view.jsp?EID=550942
And more genericlly :
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=assert+Java+%22jdk+1.4%22&btnG=Google+Search
There's also some commercial ones, among which JTest from parasoft.
 
 
2/
Nope very unlikely, though...
Future will tell.
 
Thomas,
